body:
Pride of a nation, a beast made of steel
Bismarck in motion, king of the ocean
He was made to rule the waves across the seven seas
To lead the war machine
To rule the waves and lead the Kriegsmarine
The terror of the seas
The Bismarck and the Kriegsmarine
Two thousand men, and fifty thousand tons of steel
Set the course for the Atlantic with the Allies on their heel
Firepower, firefight
Battle Stations, keep the targets steady in sight
Pride of a nation, a beast made of steel
I have the same attitude like this guy.....but not that kind of attitude on page 20
The admiral say all good qualities of Bismark that i like hehehehe well done
I actually started laughing at the lower part of panel 19
